iemocap:
Provide your response in text. Only select the Label from "{label_list}". Do not generate Label that are not in the list. Your response must include 'Label: ' followed by the selected label and 'Confidence Score: ' followed by a score from 0 to 1 indicating your confidence. Only generate Label and Confidence Score. Respond according to the [Format].

[Format]
<Label>: [Your Selected Label Here]
<Confidence Score>: [Your Confidence Score Here]
